name: Internet_macAddressTest
description: Unit tests for the macAddress method in the Internet class.

test_cases.name: testMacAddressWithNullPrefix
test_cases.description: Tests the macAddress method with a null prefix, ensuring the result is a valid MAC address.

test_cases.name: testMacAddressWithEmptyPrefix
test_cases.description: Tests the macAddress method with an empty prefix, ensuring the result is a valid MAC address.

test_cases.name: testMacAddressWithValidPrefix
test_cases.description: Tests the macAddress method with a valid prefix, ensuring the result is a valid MAC address starting with the given prefix.
